content: That's a great idea about creating a Twitter thread with step-by-step instructions for the natural everyday makeup tutorial. I'll definitely keep that in mind. For the video, I think I'll create a short 60-second video showcasing the final look, with captions explaining the products used and the techniques applied. Do you think I should share a sneak peek of the tutorial on TikTok to get my followers excited and drive traffic to my Twitter account?
